eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
recoursemech:
Sykes  Enterprises, Inc elects to satisfy the requirements of the Safe Harbor Enforcement Principles by committing to cooperate with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) or their authorized representatives in the investigation and resolution of complaints brought under the Safe Harbor and will comply with advice given  by the DPAs regarding specific actions required to comply with the Safe Harbor Principles. Sykes is also registered with American Arbitration Association.

Personal Data Covered: Employee and Consumer Personal Data
